component.name: MEI Galaxy Viewer
component.summary: Procedural galaxy viewer powered by MEI (matter-energy-information)

description.p: MEI Galaxy Viewer is an interactive procedural galaxy exploration tool. Navigate through billions of procedurally generated star systems, each with unique stars, planets, moons, and asteroid belts.

ul.li: Procedurally generated galaxy with psuedo-realistic stellar distributions
Detailed star systems with planets, moons, and asteroid belts
